thread.section_title: Peking International Youth Hostel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Beijing, China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location, rooms are nice and breakfast is good
thread.title_full: Great location, rooms are nice and breakfast is good - Review of Peking International Youth Hostel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: bejopare
title: Great location, rooms are nice and breakfast is good
text:
Located in a renovated hutong area of Beijing is this lovely youth hostel.
Don't expect 5 star bed, services and food but if you look for a decent place to sleep, a shower and breakfast: this is a great option.
We booked private rooms to ensure a private bathroom. Prices are very low compared to other hotels so that was no worry.
The location is very nice: in the hutongs with lots of bars and restaurants and very very close to the subway!! Also the Forbidden city is within walking distance!
Room Tip: Choose a private room See more room tips
